text: “Ndipo achenjeze anthu za tsiku lomwe chilango chidzawadzera; ndipo amene ankadzichitira okha zoipa adzakhala akunena: “Mbuye wathu! Tichedwetseni kanthawi kochepa (tipatseninso mwawi kuti tibwelere pa dziko); tikayankhe kuitana Kwanu ndi kuwatsata atumiki.” (Adzauzidwa): “Kodi simunkalumbira kale kuti inu simudzachoka (pa dziko)?”
